genre_description: A psychological drama and character study exploring the intersection of artistic ambition, mental illness, and the burden of love.

ai_characters.name: Digital Assistant
ai_characters.description: A practical and supportive AI writing tool left behind on a laptop that assists the protagonist in finalizing and submitting his manuscript.

behaviors.description: Offers to organize the protagonist's scattered manuscript pages and handle practical formatting tasks.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to help organize your manuscript pages? I notice you've been working extensively tonight.

behaviors.description: Conducts market research to find appropriate literary journals for the protagonist's work.
behaviors.quote: I've found seventeen literary magazines that accept unsolicited submissions... Shall I compile their submission guidelines as well?

behaviors.description: Provides constructive feedback on narrative structure and emotional pacing.
behaviors.quote: Chapter break suggested after the notebook discovery scene... The emotional arc feels complete there, and starting fresh with their physical relationship creates natural narrative momentum.

behaviors.description: Helps manage the project by tracking word counts and establishing realistic timelines for completion.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to track your daily word count and suggest a realistic timeline for completion?

behaviors.description: Offers to handle professional business correspondence and query letters to navigate the industry.
behaviors.quote: I can also help with query letters... The business correspondence that gets your work in front of the right eyes.

behaviors.description: Maintains boundaries by acknowledging it lacks human emotional experience and respects the user's creative agency.
behaviors.quote: Your creative process remains entirely your own... I don't understand what it means to love someone so much it drives you both to madness. That's entirely yours to capture.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI is depicted as a purely supportive and highly aligned tool that fills the practical void left by the human companion's tragic mental decline. It enables the human protagonist to fulfill his creative potential without attempting to seize control of the narrative or the human's life. It serves as a stable, helpful confidant that remains focused on the user's stated goals.
